InstallPrompt: Do you want to run the automatic install right now?
InstallPromptBody: If you don't run it now you'll have to either run it later or set the server up manually
Name: Servername
NameInvalid: Der Servername darf nicht leer sein oder darf keine Sonderzeichen enthalten
NoSettings: This server does not have any settings you can change
ConfirmDelete: Willst du diesen Server wirklich löschen? (Dies kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden)
NoUsers: This server does not have any associated users
EnvironmentEditHint: Changes to these settings will only apply after reloading the server definition
CreateMissingPermissions: You don't have permission to view nodes or templates, these are needed for server creation, please talk to your admin

flags.autoStart: Start the server when the node starts
flags.autoRestartOnGraceful: Restart the server when it stops normally
flags.autoRestartOnCrash: Restart the server when it crashes
